TopicTitle: How do you get multiple Kerbals on EVA?

Articles.Content:
Title says it all, I never really played around with it until now and I want to try some orbital stuff with the little jetpacks.

Thanks

When You already have a Kerbal on EVA, move him a bit away from "hatch" area, then use [ or ] to switch back to the ship. And You can take another Kerbal out (to a prom?)

EDIT: Welcome to the forum! Many good landings
